name: places/ChIJbZzWcspZwokRzJwpY4l7cxk
formattedAddress: W 30th St, New York, NY 10011, USA
adrFormatAddress: W 30th St, New York, NY 10011, USA

originalText.text:
First time! Amazing experience, only way to travel from the airport. Flight was amazing, service was amazing. Only thing - and maybe it's just me - but wifi at the airport lounge and a welcome drink there too would be perfect.

Loved it and will do it next time for sure!

text.text:

originalText.text: Horrible first time experience using Blade. Changed my flight and have email confirmation stating that the agents had changed my reservation to a different day. Log in the day before my flight with Blade to still see my original reservation date listed instead of the new one. When I called and spoke with Charley, he stated that because I bought the basic fare I was not eligible for a refund and they would "graciously" make an exception to refund my credit card if I paid the $95 cancellation fee even though this was their mistake. I don't see why I had to pay the cancellation fee as this was an error on their end as I had it in writing that my flight was confirmed to be changed for the new date by a different agent named Greta. I should have been refunded the full amount regardless of the fare type since this was an error and terrible lapse of judgement on their end.

originalText.text: We had a great experience. Flawless and super friendly with any contact and at any touchpoint. Flight was smooth and shuttle was fast and professional.

text.text: We had a great experience. Flawless and super friendly with any contact and at any touchpoint. Flight was smooth and shuttle was fast and professional.

originalText.text: Terrible customer service right from the off. As more details came though after booking, I wanted to cancel and was told I had to do it within 15 minutes of booking. Terrible customer service. Driver went to the wrong terminal, so I had to get a train to get there, only to turn back. Complimentary drink was a bottle of warm water, not even a glass to drink it in. If you think this is a high end luxury service, think again

originalText.text: I was traveling solo through NYC to Iceland. I spent a few days in NYC and decided I wanted to try BLADE to get to JFK to get to my next destination. The luggage pick up from my hotel was extremely easy and the BLADE lounge was very comfortable. I have zero regrets and appreciated the customer service. Definitely worth the money because you get an arial view of some of NYC tourists spots.
